verses.roman:
tāra madhye śivānanda-saṅge kukkura āilā
prabhu tāre kṛṣṇa kahāñā mukta karilā

synonyms: tāra madhye—in that chapter; śivānanda-saṅge—with Śivānanda Sena; kukkura—the dog; āilā—came; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāre—unto him (the dog); kṛṣṇa kahāñā—inducing to chant Kṛṣṇa; mukta karilā—liberated.
translation: That chapter also describes the incident of Śivānanda Sena's dog, who was induced by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to chant the holy name of Kṛṣṇa and was thus liberated.
